description: This file defines API route handlers for a music streaming platform backend, including user authentication, playlist management, recently played tracks, statistics, and integration with the Audius API.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Handles user signup via email, storing a profile in the database.

methods.name: signin
methods.description: Handles user signin, retrieving profile data.

methods.name: signout
methods.description: Handles user signout, effectively a no-op on server side.

methods.name: listPlaylists
methods.description: Lists playlists owned by the current user.

methods.name: createPlaylist
methods.description: Creates a new playlist for the current user.

methods.name: getPlaylist
methods.description: Retrieves a specific playlist and its tracks.

methods.name: updatePlaylist
methods.description: Updates playlist details such as name and description.

methods.name: addTrackToPlaylist
methods.description: Adds a track to a specified playlist.

methods.name: removeTrackFromPlaylist
methods.description: Removes a specified track from a playlist.

methods.name: getRecentlyPlayed
methods.description: Retrieves recent listening history for the user.

methods.name: logPlay
methods.description: Logs a track play into the listening history.

methods.name: getStatisticsSummary
methods.description: Returns a summary of total plays.

methods.name: searchAudiusTracks
methods.description: Performs a track search on Audius platform.

methods.name: getTrackStream
methods.description: Gets the streaming URL for a track from Audius.
